lines: meree priya
aaj mujhe kuchh bhee achchha nahee lag raha
aaj mujhe har koee apana dushman lag raha hai
apana hee nahee tumhaara bhee
aur yah sab isalie ki sabake man kaale hain gande hai aur sab apanee bhaavanaon kee thaah rakhate hue doosaron par apane dosh madh dete hain
hamen hamaaree bhaavanaon se hamen hamaaree jindagee ko thokar lagaakar apanee bhaavanaon kee raksha ke lie kurbaanee dene ko ukasaate hai
yahee kaaran raha hai meree priya shuru se hee meree asantushti ka
tumhaaraapatr padha to man hua mai sab se lad padoon sabase
tumhaaree mammee se suneeta deedee se aur aur apane bade bhaiya se
main samajha tha prem ne baat samaapt karava dee lekin lagata hai koee hai aisa jo is chingaaree ko hava dena chaahata hai
mera man samajhaata hai mujhe aakhir mera unake kahate rahane se kya vaasta jis baat ko sochane ka matalab nahee usake lie pareshaan kyon hona meretumhaare bhavishy ke nirnaayak ye nahee ho sakate
aur aisa ulataaseedha sochane vaalon ko main apane man mein koee jagah nahee de sakata
yah theek hai ki mujhe unake sochane ke dhang ko badalane ka koee hak nahin hai
tab kya unhen meree bhaavanaon ko chot pahunchaane ka koee hak banata hai
meree jindagee meree hai aur sada meree rahegee

hamatum dono milakar jitana hamase ho sakega doosaron ko sukh denge yah hamaare apane daayare kee baat hai lekin ham dono ko alagalag rakhakar yadi koee nirnay lena chaahega to yah usakee bahut badee bhool hogee
aisa chaahane vaala na hamaare sukh kee chaah rakhata hai na kisee aur kee bhaavanaon kee thaah hai use
is sambandh mein vistaar mein baat main tumase milane par karunga
agale itavaar ko aane kee koshish karunga
meree jindagee ka koee bhee nirnay hoga vah tumhaaremere ek samajhe jaane ke baad hoga
aur main tumhen apane se alag rakhakar koee nirnay nahee le sakata
isalie aisa koee nirnay lene ka koee prashn hee nahee uthata jisamen meretumhaare alagaav kee baat uthe
main peechhe deharaadoon aa raha tha
phir apane aap sab baat samaapt ho gaee
socha tha aur vishvaas diya gaya tha ki tum tak koee baat nahee pahunchegee aur jo kuchh jahaan se shuru hua hai vaheen aakar khatm ho gaya hai
iseelie yah kshanik ulajhan bhee door ho gaee thee

lekin mammee ne apane man mein na jaane kya bitha rakha hai ya unake man mein na jaane kya bitha diya gaya hai bhaiyaabhaabhee va suneeta deedee ke dvaara ki doosara kuchh soch nahin pa rahee hain unakee vaastavik manodasha tum jaanatee hee ho
usake lie kaha suneeta deedee ne kuchh nahin hoga veena ko
sambhal jaegee to apana legee amit ko
bas amit ko kurbaanee denee hogee kuchh samay tak sab sahana hoga aur mujhe ukasaane ko yah kaha jae ki priya to veena ke kaaran amit se baandhee hai
vah apanee bahan kee khaatir use jhat se bhool jaegee aiseevaisee kaee baaten huee theen jo baad mein nimmee bhaabhee ne mujhe bataeen
yah to prem ka bhala ho jo usane saaree baat sambhaal lee aur kade shabdon mein sabake munh band kar die
main apane ko inake banaaye taraajoo mein jise inhonne tyaag ka naam diya hai nahin tol sakata
isase behatar to marana hai
aur sabase behatar hai apane aap mein dradh rahana yahee satyaagrah hai kah do tum inase ki tum mujhe mujhase bhee jyaada pyaar karatee ho
ab tum apane man ko shaant karo
bure svapn kee tarah bhool jao is baat ko aur achchhe kee kalpana karo
ab koee ulajhan aae to prem bhaiya se salaah karana ek bhaee kee tarah nahee ek mitr kee tarah
mujhe us par poora vishvaas hai
aur veena bhaabhee ke lie chinta mat karo
vah mereetumhaaree ham sabakee aadaraneey hain
use apana jeevan jis tarah achchha lagega main yathaayogy sahaayata karunga
kal hee dev ke kaalej ke kuchh saathee aae the
bhaabhee ko dev ke badale koee na koee naukaree mil jaegee aur isase unaka man bahal jaega
haan ek baat aur mainne jo pahale tumase kabhee nahee kee

maine jabase mahasoos kiya tha ki dev ab nahee bachega tabhee se soch tha ki bhaabhee ko jab bhee usaka man theek ho jaega main svayan utsaahit karunga svayan koshish karunga unake lie koee behatar var dhoondhane ke lie
lekin yah sab karane ka abhee samay nahee aaya
abhee samay hai unhen unakee bhaavanaon ko kaheen thes na lage aur unhen kaheen yah na mahasoos ho ki unhen asahaay jaanakar sab un par apanee ichchha laadana chaah rahe hai
aasha hai meree bhaavanaon ko tum samajh gaee hogee aur tum sada kee tarah mera saath dogee
ab mujhe tumhaare pahale jaise patron kee prateeksha rahegee
apane pyaar ke saath
sirph tumhaara
amit

amit ne apana likha patr ek baar phir padha aur patr achchhee tarah se band karake naveen bhaee saahab ko de diya jo ki priya ke padosee the aur priya va any sabhee unhen apane bade bhaee kee tarah maanate the
patr dene ke baad amit ko priya ke patr kee prateeksha thee
usaka dil dar raha tha kisee anahonee ko
sach do dil door ho to chhoteesee shanka ka nivaaran hone mein kuchh pal nahin kaee din lag jaate hain aur aise mein palapal yug ke samaan lagata hai
priya ko patr mila
padhakar samajh gaee ki bhaavanaon ke aavesh mein usane man mein aaee baat to likh dee thee lekin usane mammee aur usake beech huee baat ka khulaasa nahin kiya tha
yahee kaaran tha ki amit mammee se naaraaj ho gaya tha
aise mein priya ke paas patr likhane ke atirikt koee aur saadhan nahin tha
vah amit ko patr likhane baith gaeeh
mere priy amit
naveen bhaee saahab dvaara tumhaara patr mila
amit bahut naaraaj ho na tum mammee se
lekin tum galat samajh rahe ho aur bevajah tum mammee se rusht ho gae
mammee ne mujhase kuchh nahin kaha aur na hee mujh par kisee tarah ka davaab daala balki vah to is paksh mein bilkul bhee nahin hain
tumane mammee ko kasam dee thee ki vah mujhe is vishay mein kuchh na bataen aur sach mammee mujhe kuchh bataana bhee nahin chaahatee theen
vaastav mein main kamare mein aankhen band karake letee huee thee
mammee ne samajha kee main so rahee hoon
tab vah thaapa aantee se baat kar rahee theen ki mohan bhaiya to svayan priya se poochhane ke lie deharaadoon aane ko taiyaar ho gae the
amit bahut roya

yah sunakar mai ekadam baith gaee aur mammee se poochha ki kyon roya tha amit mujhase kya poochhane ke lie aa rahe the mohan bhaiya aur phir maine bahut jidd kee tab mammee ne mujhe sab kuchh bata diya
sab sunatesunate main rone lagee tab mammee ne kaha beta aisa kabhee sambhav nahee ho sakata
mammee se aur kuchh nahee poochha svayan hee mere man mein bahut se vichaar aane lage the
sab deedee ke lie kuchh karana chaahate hai sabhee use sukhee dekhana chaahate hai tab main roda kyon banoon tab man mein unakee bhaavanaon ke vishay mein koee baat nahin aaee thee
vyakti bahut adhik bhaavuk ho jaata hai tab ek tarapha baat hee sochata hai
ab sab theek hai amit
bas ab hamen vishvaas hona chaahie ki ham ekadoosare ko chaahate hainaur chaahate rahenge sada duniyaan mein koee taakat hamen ekadoosare se alag nahee kar sakatee
ham sab deevaaron ko tod kar milenge
haan amit main tumhaara hamesha saath doongee
duhkh me sukh mein jeene mein marane mein
amit priya tumase alag nahin
ye baat sada yaad rakhana
amit aajakal mujhe kuchh achchha nahee lagata
apana man thoda doosaree or lagaane ke lie mainne penting kors me pravesh le liya hai
ghar par baith kar to bas pichhalee baaten ghoomatee rahatee hai
raharah kar veena deedee ka chehara aansooon se bharee aankhen
kitana anyaay hua hai usake saath
vidhava ka kalank laga diya usake saath jabaki usako jaanaboojh kar vidhava banaaya gaya hai
usakee shaadee ke samay sab anjaam se vaaphik the
jojo jaanate the sab chupachaap dekhate rahe ek maasoom par anyaay hote hue
ab sahaanubhooti se kya hoga usaka jo kho chuka hai ab use nahee mil sakata
kisee kee hamadardee usaka ghaav nahee bhar sakatee
duhkh sabhee ko hai par sabhee bhool jaenge kuchh samay pashchaat
kuchh samay pashchaat sabhee kee dinacharya vaisee hee ho jaegee jaisee thee
lekin veena deedee ka duhkh soonaapan jindagee bhar ka hai
amit aajakal ham sabhee kee aur sabase adhik mammee kee dasha badee sochaneey ho rahee hai
ghar par sabhee jaanapahachaan vaale aate rahate hain aur sau tarah ke prashn karate hain
jaise ki kainsar itanee jaldee to nahee phail jaata
unhen bahut pahale se pata hoga
aur bhee na jaane kyaakya tark karate hain
ab kaun unhen saaree baaten vistaar se batae bas chup hokar rah jaate hai
amit tumhaare parivaar vaale bade maje se kahate hain ki hamane to shaadee se pahale akhabaar mein chhapavaaya tha saara kuchh vistaar se bataaya tha
lekin sachchaee ab sabhee jaanate hain
veena deedee mein aisee kya buraee thee jo hamane sab kuchh jaanate hue usakee shaadee kar dee
tumhaare rishtedaar bhee yahee sochate honge ki hamane jaanaboojh kar unhen gart mein dhakel diya
amit main ye sab nahee likhana chaahatee thee lekin logon kee baat sunasunakar kabheekabhee bahut rosh aata hai aur tab dil karata hai ki jorajor se chilla kar kahoon ki hamaare saath dhokha hua hai
ek anyaay hua hai kisee kee jindagee par
par ab kya phaayada tum bura mat maanana in sab baaton ka tumase koee sambandh nahee aur na hee tumhaara koee dosh hai
aur tumane hamesha unake saath achchha hee kiya hai
yah sab likh kar main apana man halka kar rahee hoon
amit aaj main kitanee svaarthee ho gaee hoon jo ki apane man ko halka karane ke lie tumhaare dil ko duhkha rahee hoon
amit apane man mein aaee har baat tumhen bataane se mujhe shaanti milatee hai
amit ab tum apane man ko shaant kar lo mammee vaastav mein tumhen bahut chaahatee hai
ghar bhar mein sab tumhaara aadar karate hai aur mammee to abhee bhee kah rahee hain ki kuchh din baad tum svayan veena deedee ko lekar deharaadoon chale aana
kuchh din yahaan rah loge to tumhaara man shaant ho jaega
isee ke saath
apane pyaar ke saath
tumhaaree priya
